actions.text: DEBATE - Pursuant to a previous order, the House proceeded with one hour of debate on the Michel resolution.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous  order of the House.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 347 - 64 (Roll no. 92).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Directing the release of certain materials relating to the inquiry of the operation of the Bank of the Sergeant-at-Arms pursuant to House Resolution 236.

summary.text: Directs the Sergeant at Arms to collect and provide to the Special Counsel Malcolm Wilkey 41 microfilm rolls in the possession of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct relating to the inquiry of the operation of the House Bank. Declares it to be the will of the House to maintain such communication and cooperation with the Special Counsel as will promote the ends of justice consistent with the privileges and rights of the House.

titles.title: Directing the release of certain materials relating to the inquiry of the operation of the Bank of the Sergeant-at-Arms pursuant to House Resolution 236.
